page.title: 17My afternoon
page.content: Sarah and I walk down to our house for lunch.We've got chips,baked beans and fish fingers.After lunch we go outside and play on the Slip and Slide, which is a long piece of plastic with water running down it.Sarah goes down and says "It's freezing but brilliant!" We take turns for about half an hour until we get bored.Then we go and sun bathe,we would like to have a tan. Sarah's mum comes to collect her. Sarah's mum asks if I would like to go back with them.We play for about an hour on the swings and trampoline.We have tea and then Sarah's mum takes me home.
